DbDetails.DbTable: vtigercrm6.vtiger_troubletickets v left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_ticketcategories v0 on v.category=v0.ticketcategories_id left join vtigercrm6.contacts_v c on v.contact_id=c.contactid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_troubletickets v1 on v.parent_id=v1.ticketid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_ticketpriorities v2 on v.priority=v2.ticketpriorities_id left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_ticketseverities v3 on v.severity=v3.ticketseverities_id left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_ticketstatus v4 on v.status=v4.ticketstatus_id left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_groups v5 on v.groupname=v5.groupid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_products v6 on v.product_id=v6.productid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_users v7 on v.created_by=v7.id left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_users v8 on v.last_update_by=v8.id
